title: Apple Tart
summary: Need a lacto ovo vegetarian dessert? Apple Tart could be a super recipe to try. This recipe makes 8 servings with 279 calories, 3g of protein, and 14g of fat each. For 82 cents per serving, this recipe covers 5% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person found this recipe to be yummy and satisfying. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour. Head to the store and pick up salt, granny smith apples, ice water, and a few other things to make it today. It is brought to you by orangette.blogspot.com. With a spoonacular score of 9%, this dish is very bad (but still fixable).
